column6:
My apartment complex is very peaceful & quiet, a couple steps from the pool & you can't beat the lush greenery in the surrounding area, it's amazing!

Great places to eat locally! Near grocery stores and scenic parks including River Legacy Park. Other local attractions include the Ranger's Stadium, AT&T/ Cowboys Stadium, 6 Flags over Texas & Hurricane Harbor.

About 25 minutes to either Downtown Dallas or Downtown Fort Worth and both major airports.
